name: VirusWALL ClamAV Virus Graphs/Reporting
short_description: VirusWALL is a ClamAV Virus Graph/Info Tool/Report Generator. For Virus traffic on your SMTP Gateway, EMail server or SMB/UFS Fileserver utilizing Clam AntiVirus. Real-time reporting via a web interface, Graphs are Pure CSS for speed and efficiency.
